title: Game sticking/lagging/freezing
body:
(Ignore redirect link)
https://i.stack.imgur.com/Fp470.png

I first got a error message (the one above) and I followed instructions to fix it and I think I managed to but then when I tried to load in a game it would take forever to load after champion selection and would end up loading 3-10 minutes after the actual game had started (I was playing with friends in the same room and could see that I was AFK in base from their screen) I would get AFK warnings when it actually loaded or just get disconnected for being inactive.  I sometimes also get error messages about my network connections even though it's fine.



When the game does load it is almost impossible to play because of how much it laggs and freezes. 

I updated my graphics cards, drivers and lol to try and fix the problem. It had been playing fine for months but all of a sudden this has happened. 

Someone please help xD

replies.body: It sounds to me like your network is just having a *really* hard time connecting to the game servers after the match actually starts. There might be something blocking your connection somewhat, so make sure you have firewalls either disabled or have exceptions for League setup. Also, go through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for the steps on Port Forwarding and DNS settings, as those have good luck getting players a smoother link with us.
